price: តើពួកយើងបានសើចចំអកឱ្យពួកគេដោយច្រឡំឬក៏ភ្នែក (របស់ពួកយើង)មើលមិនឃើញពួកគេ(នៅក្នុងឋាននរក)?
arabic: أَتَّخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا أَمۡ زَاغَتۡ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: attakhadhnāhum sikh'riyyan am zāghat ʿanhumu al-abṣāru
